overview.en: BBC BITBOSS Coin has realized online crowdfunding, sharing income, risk sharing, mine pool monitoring, real-time miner, and realized the real circulation of calculation force and online secondary market of mining machine. Use the free market power to improve the mining process, increase the income of the participants, and lower the threshold of initial investment of investors. Making digital money mine is no longer a monopoly. Technology development, operation and maintenance, supply chain management and other complex technologies are no longer a barrier to digital currency mining and public participation.
overview.zh: BBC（BITBOSS COIN） 将挖矿项目实现了在线众筹，共享收益，分摊风险，矿池监控，实时分币，并且实现了真正意义上的算力流通以及矿机二级市场在线化。利用自由市场的力量完善挖矿的各个环节，增加参与者的收益，降低投资人的初始投入门槛。让数字货币挖矿，不再是一个垄断的⾏业。使得技术开发，运行维护，供应链管理等复杂的技术，不再成为阻隔数字货币挖矿与大众参与的门槛。
